entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
